p: Most of the dengue cohorts in Latin America and South East Asia are pediatric cohorts [ 29, 35, 37, 38, 45, 51â€“ 54]. Our cohort and the cohort from Iquitos, Peru have similar design, both have participants from all age groups and active surveillance was done at schools [ 55, 56]. Our cohort provides the opportunity to collect prospective data in all ages to understand better the full burden of dengue and other arboviruses that have emerged in the region.
